item.title: The Cambodian Getaway [Part 2] - Mountains and Beaches
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: We went back to Phnom Penh to meet Papa and Chachu. We had tried to experiment with family travel this time. We wanted to get the Dads separate from the Moms. Parul’s father had to cancel due to certain last minute emergency but Papa and Chachu made it. We stayed in Phnom Penh for a few days exploring the city and it’s food. The biggest challnege was finding what would interest the Dads so we tried a mix of everything.
